content: White woman here. Thank you for this. Really made me think of my own privilege and how I occupy spaces. I’m not one of those white women that demands more cheese at chipotle, but I AM that person that, among many other things, ties my salary to my self-worth (as much as I know it isn’t, but how I measure my self-worth is a giant can of worms I won’t open right now). I’m a very determined person and I won’t lie, one motivator behind my determination is the belief that I “deserve” more. I never took a moment to evaluate where that belief comes from. Thank you again, lots to think about.
